fields.text: Thank you for calling Coffee Meets Bagel in San Francisco, where you can meet your everything bagel today.
For account and billing inquiries, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to account support.
For technical assistance with the Coffee Meets Bagel app, press [INDEX].
Your technical support specialist will be with you shortly, please hold.
For matchmaking and dating services, press [INDEX].
We are preparing your personalized date suggestions, please hold.
For local San Francisco events and meet-ups, press [INDEX].
Fetching the latest event details for you, please hold.
